title: LACP Tribunal Vote
description: Schema for a vote cast by an agent within a Tribunal consensus process.

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the voting agent.

role.description: The specialized role of the agent.

confidence.description: Self-reported confidence score in the verdict.

reasoning.description: Natural language explanation of the decision.

vector_embedding.description: High-dimensional vector representation of the reasoning for sycophancy detection.

salt.description: Random salt used during the Commit phase (only present in Reveal phase).

vote_weight.description: Personality-derived vote weight. Calculated from agent's OCEAN Conscientiousness dimension. Default 1.0 for backwards compatibility. See consensus/personality.spec.md.

archetype.description: Agent personality archetype name (e.g., Scholar, Sentinel, Paladin). Informational only.
